title: National Bird - Sonia Kennebeck
text:
Average Rating: 8.2/10 Top Critics' Reviews 
Fresh: [An] elegantly unsettling documentary about the United States' reliance on aerial combat drones. – Jeannette Catsoulis, New York Times, Nov 10, 2016 
Fresh: Chilling testimony from those three veterans, each of whom helped to wage war from behind consoles half a world away, serves as the backbone of a film that adds its voice to mounting criticism of the U.S. drone program. – Peter Debruge, Variety, Nov 7, 2016 
Fresh: "National Bird" is powerful cinematic journalism. – Kimber Myers, Los Angeles Times, Nov 17, 2016 
Fresh: National Bird hardly offers any counterpoint to the arguments presented... But it does reveal a program whose international reach and seemingly limitless surveillance powers are extraordinarily difficult to keep in check – Jordan Mintzer, Hollywood Reporter, Nov 7, 2016
